COVID-19

âCOVID-19 Dashboard |Â Directives & GuidancesÂ | Isolation | Quarantine |Â ResourcesÂ | Recursos enÂ EspaÃ±olÂ | Reports | Vaccination Plan |Â Testing


To protect yourself and others, the ADH recommends:

  • Wash your hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds. Use hand sanitizer when soap and water are not available.
  • Practice physical distancing. Avoid close contact with others, especially those who are sick, by keeping at least 6 feet between you and others.
  • If you think you have been exposed to COVID-19 or develop a fever, cough, or shortness ofÂ breath, seek testing. Testing is available in many locations, including ADH Local Health Units.
  • Wear a face covering when you are exposed to non-household members and physical distancing cannot be assured. Click hereÂ to read the requirements.
